Smart Toothbrush with Sensors: A toothbrush equipped with sensors that monitor the pressure and angleed by the user. It also tracks the time spent brushing and provides personalized feedback to improve oral hygiene.
Toothbrush with Built-in Floss: A toothbrush that has a built-in floss holder, allowing users to floss easily and effectively without having to purchase floss separately.

Toothbrush with UV Sanitizer: A toothbrush that has a built-in UV sanitizer that kills 99.9% of germs on the bristles, making it a great option for people with sensitive teeth or those who want to ensure their toothbrush is always clean.

Toothbrush with App Integration: A toothbrush that connects to a mobile app, allowing users to track their brushing habits, set reminders, and receive personalized coaching to improve their oral hygiene.

Toothbrush with Interchangeable Heads: A toothbrush that has interchangeable heads, allowing users to switch between soft, medium, and hard bristles depending on their individual needs. This makes it a great option for families or people with different oral health needs.
